Name: Multiverse Mercenaries
About the game: Gameplay Navigate, Explore, and Conquer 4 procedurally generated levels Hop between the Multiverses where you will find vastly different environments from a cyberpunk club to a wild savannah. Dominate your foes as Akuma, a world-class assassin yearning for revenge, or TR-7, a state-of-the-art machine who has gone rouge Obliterate enemies to earn money and safely clear a path to a portal transferring you to another universe Purchase 22 different stackable items that turn your mercenary into a force to be reckoned with Die.Reset.Repeat. What to expect currently 4 procedurally levels that will NEVER be the same 2 characters with 3 unique abilities each in attack and movement 4 different enemies that play different roles and attack in different ways 22 items with 3 rarities that not only effect you but also effect the world and enemies 4 unique tracks. 1 for each level A game designed in pixel art What to expect in the future 1-2 more characters 2-3 more levels including a final boss stage 3-4 more enemies 6-8 more items A more prevalent story within the game Bug fixing and gameplay tweaks Mac OS support About the devs Made by me, Matthew Diamond. I am a 17-year-old high school senior making a passion project in conjunction with Curios Cardinals Curios Cardinals is a start-up company that sets up students with college-age students to work on passion projects We hope you enjoy! We really appreciate you playing our game. Please leave feedback! Feel free to reach out to our email or our Twitter! NOTE: MULTIVERSE MERCENARIES DOES NOT WORK ON MAC YET MAC VERSION WILL BE UP IN ABOUT A WEEK
